title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\StreamingRecognizeRequest
name: StreamingRecognizeRequest
description:
Request message for the [StreamingRecognize][google.cloud.speech.v2.Speech.StreamingRecognize] method. Multiple [StreamingRecognizeRequest][google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest] messages are sent. The first message must contain a [recognizer][google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest.recognizer] and optionally a [streaming_config][google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest.streaming_config] message and must not contain [audio][google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest.audio]. All subsequent messages must contain [audio][google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest.audio] and must not contain a [streaming_config][google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest.streaming_config] message.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognizeRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.recognizer
params.description: Required. Streaming recognition should start with an initial request having a recognizer. Subsequent requests carry the audio data to be recognized. The initial request with configuration can be omitted if the Recognizer being used has a [default_recognition_config][google.cloud.speech.v2.Recognizer.default_recognition_config].

params.name: data.streaming_config
params.description: StreamingRecognitionConfig to be used in this recognition attempt. If provided, it will override the default RecognitionConfig stored in the Recognizer.

methods.description:
